title: 158: Ghiberti's Gates of Paradise
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Lorenzo Ghiberti sculpted what are perhaps the most famous doors of human history. You can see them in Florence (if you go to a museum), or you can listen to this podcast and see them in your mind's eye. If you want to view them online, we've included a link in the show-notes on our website.
itunes:author: Well, originally Ghiberti, but I guess we'll do.
itunes:subtitle: I would say they are better than the gates of Hell, but those are good too.
itunes:summary: Lorenzo Ghiberti sculpted what are perhaps the most famous doors of human history. You can see them in Florence (if you go to a museum), or you can listen to this podcast and see them in your mind's eye.
